p: From different studies, it is found that extract of calyces of HS has antihypertensive and vasodilator effect in human and experimental animals viavasodilator pathways dependent and independent on theendothelium. The opening of thecGMP/nitric oxide-relaxant pathwayis derived via endothelium causesendothelium-dependent vasodilation by activation of guanylate cyclase whereas inhibition of Ca 2+ influx is responsible for endothelium independentcomponent [ 20].
